entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:54 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -17.5°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
